title: Differential Criticality Sampling Policy Configuration
description: Configuration file dictating how the Differential Criticality Sampler (DCS) prioritizes and samples incoming telemetry based on content.

policies.name: Fatal_Always_Transmit
policies.description: L5 Fatal events must bypass all sampling mechanisms.

policies.name: High_Core_Priority
policies.description: High criticality events originating from CORE components receive priority transmission rate.

policies.name: Routine_Utility_Downsample
policies.description: High volume routine logs from UTILITY modules are aggressively sampled down to reduce ingestion load.
